verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise unbroken
Praise unending
Be Yours, be Yours forevermore

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise untainted
Praise unfading
Be Yours, be Yours forevermore

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Unbroken praise be Yours, God, forever
All my praise be Yours, God, forever
Lord, take this life, let it become Your throne
Unbroken praise be Yours

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My surrender
My devotion
Be yours, be yours forevermore
Be yours, be yours forevermore

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let my deeds outrun my word
And let my life outweigh my songs
